content.title: Financial Assistance for the Purchase of Lifejackets and Lifebuoys for Fishermen
content.details: Financial Assistance for the Purchase of Lifejackets and Lifebuoys for Fishermen is a scheme by the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, financial assistance amounting to ₹50% is provided by the Government to eligible fishermen for the Purchase of Lifejackets and Lifebuoys. The applications are accepted only in offline mode.
benefits: The support is extended up to ₹1,000/- per lifejacket and ₹1,500/- per lifebuoy.
For Canoe Fitted With OBM: 05 Life Jackets and 01 Lifebuoy.
For Mechanised Trawlers Engaged in Trawling Operations: 08 Life Jackets and 02 Lifebuoys.
For Mechanised Trawlers Engaged in Purse Seining Operation: 25 Life Jackets and 04 Lifebuoys.
eligibility: The applicant should be a traditional fisherman by birth or profession.
The applicant should be a resident of Goa.
The applicant should possess one of the following: a Canoe Fitted With OBM; Mechanised Trawlers Engaged in Trawling or Purse Seining Operations.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents. Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the concerned authority at the Department of Fisheries, Dayanand Bandodkar Marg, Patto Colony, Panaji Goa - 403 521, or to the official posted at BDO Office/Sub-Offices of the Department of Fisheries.
documents_required: Updated Fishing License Certificate/Fishing Net License Receipts

faqs.question: What is the total financial assistance provided for a canoe fitted with an outboard motor (OBM) under the scheme?
faqs.answer: For a canoe fitted with OBM, financial assistance includes 05 life jackets and 01 lifebuoy.

faqs.question: Is there a specific application form for the scheme, and where can it be obtained?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is an application form available at https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Natural-Calamity-Application-Form.pdf.

faqs.question: Is there any specific criteria for Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) under the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there are no specific criteria for Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the address for submitting the application form and documents for financial assistance?
faqs.answer: The address is Department of Fisheries, Dayanand Bandodkar Marg, Patto Colony, Panaji Goa - 403 521, or designated BDO Office/Sub-Offices.

faqs.question: What is the department's contact information for inquiries?
faqs.answer: Contact information can be found at https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/contact-us-2/#.

faqs.question: Where can the guidelines for the scheme be found?
faqs.answer: The guidelines can be found at https://goaprintingpress.gov.in/downloads/2122/2122-40-SI-OG-0.pdf and https://fisheries.goa.gov.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/CitizenCharter-2.pdf.

faqs.question: Is there an application fee for availing financial assistance under the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, the application fee is nil for the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the website of the Department of Fisheries, Government of Goa?
What is the grievance redressal mechanism for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Grievances can be registered with the Grievance Redressal Officer or through dir-fish.goa@nic.in, with actions communicated within 30 days.

faqs.question: How can an interested applicant submit the application for financial assistance?
faqs.answer: The applicant should submit the filled and signed form along with required documents to the Department of Fisheries or its designated offices.

faqs.question: What is the application mode for availing financial assistance under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The application mode is offline, and the prescribed form can be obtained from the department.

faqs.question: Is there any deadline for submitting applications for financial assistance under the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no deadline for submitting applications; however, applications are accepted only in offline mode.

faqs.question: What documents are required for availing financial assistance under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Required documents include updated fishing license certificate, vessel registration certificate, Aadhaar card, and mandate form.

faqs.question: How much financial support is extended for each lifejacket and lifebuoy under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The support is up to ₹1,000/- per lifejacket and ₹1,500/- per lifebuoy.
